alt-labels.description: Places the labels beneath the step.

bg-color.description: Applies specified color to the control’s background. Used on components that also support the color prop. - supports utility colors (for example success or purple) or css color (#033 or rgba(255, 0, 0, 0.5)). Find a list of built-in classes on the colors page.
bg-color.description_zh: 将指定的颜色应用于控件的背景。用于也支持 color 属性的组件。- 支持实用程序颜色（例如成功或紫色）或 CSS 颜色（#033 或 rgba（255， 0， 0， 0.5））。在颜色页面上查找内置类的列表。

border.description: Apply a border style to the component.

color.description: Applies specified color to the control - supports utility colors (for example success or purple) or css color (for example success or purple) or css color (#033 or rgba(255, 0, 0, 0.5)). Find a list of built-in classes on the colors page.
color.description_zh: 将指定的颜色应用于控件 - 支持实用程序颜色（例如成功或紫色）或 css 颜色（例如成功或紫色）或 css 颜色（#033 或 rgba（255， 0， 0， 0.5））。在颜色页面上查找内置类的列表。

disabled.description: Set all child components to a disabled state.
disabled.description_zh: 将所有子组件设置为禁用状态。

elevation.description: The elevation of the component is acceptable from 0 to 24. You can read more on the Elevation page.
elevation.description_zh: 组件的海拔可接受 0 到 24 之间的值。你可以在 elevation page 浏览更多信息。

flat.description: Removes the level of the stepper.

height.description: Sets the height of the component.

hide-actions.description: Hide actions bar (prev and next buttons).
hide-actions.description_zh: 隐藏操作栏（上一个和下一个按钮）。

:items.description: An array of strings or objects used for automatically generating children components.
:items.description_zh: 用于自动生成子组件的字符串或对象的数组。

item-title.description: Property on supplied items that contains its title.
item-title.description_zh: 包含其标题的所提供项的属性。

item-value.description: Property on supplied items that contains its value.
item-value.description_zh: 所提供项的属性，其中包含其值。

location.description: Specifies the component’s location. Can combine by using a space separated string.
location.description_zh: 指定组件的位置。可以使用空格分隔的字符串进行组合。

mandatory.description: Force at least one item to be selected, if available.
mandatory.description_zh: 强制至少选择一个项目（如果可用）。

:max.description: Set the maximum number that can be selected.
:max.description_zh: 设置可以选择的最大数量。

max-height.description: Sets the maximum height of the component.

max-width.description: Sets the maximum width of the component.

min-height.description: Sets the minimum height of the component.

min-width.description: Sets the minimum width of the component.

mobile.description: Forces the stepper into a mobile state, removing labels from stepper items.
mobile.description_zh: 强制步进器进入移动状态，从步进器项目中删除标签。

:v-model.description: The value of the component v-mode. If the component supports variants, the default is an empty array.
:v-model.description_zh: 组件 v-mode 的值。如果组件支持多属性，默认为空数组。

multiple.description: Allows you to select multiple options.

next-text.description: The text used for the Next button.
next-text.description_zh: 用于“下一步”按钮的文本。

non-linear.description: Allow user to jump to any step.
non-linear.description_zh: 允许用户跳转到任何步骤。

position.description: Sets the position for the component.

prev-text.description: The text used for the Prev button.
prev-text.description_zh: 用于“上一步”按钮的文本。

rounded.description: Applies the border-radius style to the specified component. You can get more information about this on the Corner Radius of Borders page
rounded.description_zh: 对指定的组件应用 border-radius 样式。您可以在 边框的圆角半径页面 获取更多有关信息

selected-class.description: Configure the name of the CSS class that will be applied when the selected item is selected.
selected-class.description_zh: 配置被选中项目时应用的 CSS 类名。

tag.description: Specifies the custom tag to be used on the root element.
tag.description_zh: 指定在根元素上使用的自定义标签。

theme.description: Specify a theme for this component and all of its children.
theme.description_zh: 为此组件及其所有子组件指定主题。

width.description: Sets the width of the component.

events.name: update:modelValue
events.description: An event that is raised when a component's model-value changes.
events.description_zh: 当组件的 model-value 更改时引发的事件。

slots.name: [`header-item.${string}`]
slots.description: Slot for customizing header items when using the items prop.
slots.description_zh: 使用 items 属性时用于自定义标题项的插槽。

slots.name: [`item.${string}`]
slots.description: Slot for customizing the content for each step.
slots.description_zh: 用于自定义每个步骤内容的插槽。

slots.name: actions
slots.description_zh: 用于自定义 v-stepper-actions 的插槽。

slots.name: header
slots.description_zh: 用于自定义标题的插槽。

slots.name: header-item
slots.description: Slot for customizing all header items.
slots.description_zh: 用于自定义所有标题项的插槽。

slots.name: icon
slots.description: Slot for customizing all stepper item icons.
slots.description_zh: 用于自定义所有步进器项目图标的插槽。

slots.name: next
slots.description: Slot for customizing the next step functionailty
slots.description_zh: 用于自定义下一步功能的插槽

slots.name: prev
slots.description: Slot for customizing the prev step functionality
slots.description_zh: 用于自定义上一步功能的插槽

slots.name: subtitle
slots.description: Slot for the component’s subtitle content.

slots.name: title
slots.description: Slot for the component’s title content.
